name: Love in the Park
description:
Love in the Park

is an episodic romantic comedy staring a dullahan and a dryad. After a chance encounter one quiet night, Saoirse, our silent protagonist, falls head over heels (almost literally in her case) for the dryad in charge of a city park.

Following along on Saoirse's misadventures as she stumbles through her first love. 

~Don't forget to bookmark this page and follow us to read the weekly updates!~

Content Advisory:

This game is recommended for people ages 16+ (contains mild sexual themes and strong language). Occasional screen shakes. Contains themes of death and existentialism. Also a lot of gay.

Main Characters Features
  • Character Dress Up! Change hairstyle, neck ribbon, and outfit!
  • Weekly Updates! Follow the story as it unfolds every week~
  • Wholesome Gay
Support the Development!

We're just two queer indie devs who like to tell gay stories- Feel free to leave us a tip on our kofi or follow us on patreon where we'll be posting 🔞artwork of Saoirse and Acorn, as well as other LGBTQ+ couples!

Follow the Development! | Credits

Creator, Writer, Programmer, Artist: McFly

Programmer, Beta Reader, Editor: Guinevere Minuet Marie Duff
